metadata.title: CVE-2018-1098 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description: A cross-site request forgery flaw was found in etcd 3.3.1 and earlier. Anattacker can set up a website that tries to send a POST request to the etcdserver and modify a key. Adding a key is done with PUT so it istheoretically safe (can't PUT from an HTML form or such) but POST allowscreating in-order keys that an attacker can send.

criterions.comment: etcd package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
